about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!
Attention! All ships in bundles are supplied fully assembled. Refitting is possible for in-game currency.

This pack includes:

  • Rank 8 Federation Suppressor class Destroyer Procyon
  • Weapon: Coilgun
  • Portrait «Taylor Nelson»

Active modules:
  • Photon Emitter
  • Multiphase shield
  • Repelling Beam
  • Wormhole projector

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

Only six months after the bankruptcy of Sol-X Inc it turned out that the corporation was spying on Federation shipyards for the Empire. By that time, the most valuable database with all the information about the Federation ships was sold at an auction. The private investor who bought it was soon discovered to have died under strange circumstances. The fate of the Sol-X database is unknown.

More recently, the corporation Procyon, previously unknown to anyone, introduced the destroyer of the same name. Despite the fact that most experts are inclined to believe that Procyon was created precisely because of the Sol-X databases, the authorities were not able to present the corporation with any charges. With its high-tech destroyer, the corporation won the state tender without any problems.
detailed_description:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!
Attention! All ships in bundles are supplied fully assembled. Refitting is possible for in-game currency.

This pack includes:

  • Rank 8 Federation Suppressor class Destroyer Procyon
  • Weapon: Coilgun
  • Portrait «Taylor Nelson»

Active modules:
  • Photon Emitter
  • Multiphase shield
  • Repelling Beam
  • Wormhole projector

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

Only six months after the bankruptcy of Sol-X Inc it turned out that the corporation was spying on Federation shipyards for the Empire. By that time, the most valuable database with all the information about the Federation ships was sold at an auction. The private investor who bought it was soon discovered to have died under strange circumstances. The fate of the Sol-X database is unknown.

More recently, the corporation Procyon, previously unknown to anyone, introduced the destroyer of the same name. Despite the fact that most experts are inclined to believe that Procyon was created precisely because of the Sol-X databases, the authorities were not able to present the corporation with any charges. With its high-tech destroyer, the corporation won the state tender without any problems.

name: Star Conflict - Procyon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This pack includes:Rank 8 Federation Suppressor class Destroyer ProcyonWeapon: CoilgunPortrait «Taylor Nelson»Active modules:Photon EmitterMultiphase shieldRepelling BeamWormhole projector
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
